text: "Hail Grenada" is the national anthem of Grenada. ==Lyrics== English lyrics Grenadian Creole French lyrics Hail! Grenada, land of ours, We pledge ourselves to thee, Heads, hearts and hands in unity To reach our destiny. Ever conscious of God, Being proud of our heritage, May we with faith and courage Aspire, build, advance As one people, one family. God bless our nation. ==Related pages== * Grenada National State Anthem ==References== Category:Grenada Category:North American anthems
title: Hail Grenada
